title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1808.13 - Notice of violation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1808.13 - Notice of violation

State Regulations

When the executive director or his/her designee issues a
notice of violation (NOV) to an alleged violator, such NOV will: (a) list the violations that are alleged to
have occurred; (b) state a date by
which the alleged violator shall respond to the NOV. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1808.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
